names.bio: Javed Akhtar was born on January 17, 1945 in Gwalior, Madhya Pradesh, India. He is a writer, known for Lakshya (2004), Deewaar (1975) and Don (1978). He has been married to Shabana Azmi since December 9, 1984. He was previously married to Honey Irani.
